text: Willelm Engla Kyncg & eorl ofer Normandie & ofer þa Mans.
Ic sende gretincge arcebiscopan & leodbiscopan abbodan & eorlan & eallum geleaffullan mannum.
We gelyfað & geara witan þat we þurh Godes mildheortnysse synd uponhafan to þisses Kynerices heahnysse.
For þi gedauenað us þat we geornlice sinægen ymb þa gesundfullan staþelunge ealles uran underðeoddan folces & swyðost þara þe dæges & nihtes swincað on Cristes ðeowdome.

We willað eac þat hit beo cuð eallan geleaffullan mannum æigþer þam þe nu andwyrde syndan on life & þam toweardan þat Arfast biscop us sæde & manegum oðrum þat his biscop stol mid rihte beon scolde on sancte Eadmundes mynstre þær se sylua orwurþa Kyning & se gecorena Cristes cempa restað.
And anbidað þara eadigan ærista dæg mid unformolsnodan lichamon.
Þa for þissere spræce wæs lange hwile micel geflit betwux Arfast biscope & Baldwine þara forseadan cyrican abbode.

Us þuhte þa riht þat hi begen comon to urum hyrede & þat heora ægþer tala come beforan us & beforan uran witan & siððan æfter heora beigra tala wære gescyled & gedæmed þat rihteste mid ercebiscopa ræde & leodbiscopa & abboda & eorla & oðra wisra manna.

Hi comon þa begen beforan us to gesetton dæge & se biscop tealde ful gerædelice his tale gif hit soð wære ac heo wæs eallum mannum geþuht idel & unnyt forþi þe he næfde naþor ne gewritu ne gewitnesse.
Se abbod Baldwine tealde þa his tala þærtogeanes ærest hu Cnut Kincg draf ut þa preostas of þara ylcan cyrican forþi þat hi unende byrdlice lifedon & nanes regoles ne gymdon.

And sette munecas þær mid gemænan ræde his arcebiscopa & leodbiscopa & abboda & eorla & manegra oðra wisra manna & þæt Ægelnoð arcebiscop of Cantwarabyrig siððan þat ilce mynster halgode þurh þæs ilcan Kynges hæse.
And þone forman abbod þæs mynstres hadode se biscop of Lundene & þone oþerne se biscop of Wincestra.
And hisne abbod Baldwine se nuis se ðridda abbod hine halgode se ercebiscop of Cantwarabyrig & he tealde ful swutelice þat ða wæs agan ðreo & fiftig geara siððan munecas þone eþelan ham gesohton.
And on eallan þam fyrste þat mynster & þæs mynstres ealdras wæron æfre uncwid & uncrafod fram eallum Arfæstes biscopes forgenglan.
And þa munecas underfengon had of swa hwilcon biscope swa him betst gelicode be heora abbodes dihte.
Siððan he þis eall geteald hæfde.
Þa brohte he forð Cnutes Kynges gewrit & Eadwardes þæs wulderfullan Kynges.
On þam wæs geswutelad þat ða Kyngas gefreodon þa halgan stowe & æcne freodom sealdon fram ealra biscopa & fram ealra woruldmanna andwealde.
Þawa heora beigra tala & þæs abbodes gewitnesse gehyrd hæfdon þa bebead ic him eallum þe ðær æt wæron þis gehyrende þat hi rihtne dom dæmdan æfter heora beigra tale.

Ða eodon þa witan togædere to þam dome se ercebiscop Lanfram of Cantwarabyrig & Thomas arcebiscop of Eoferwic & Odo biscop of Baius min broþor & eorl ofer Cent & maniga oðra biscopas & abbodas & Rodbeart min sunu & eorlas & ealle þa heafodmenn ures rices gedæmdan þat swilc ealderdom & swylcere stowe freodom scolde full wunian æfre unawemmed & staþolfæst oð worulda geendunge.
Ic geþafode þa swa hit riht wes heora ealra unwiðsecgendlican dome & geþafunge sylle.

Siððan þær æfter us gelicode þat we mid ræde arcebiscopa & biscopa & abboda & eorla & oðra manegra ura holdra manna & eac forþæs abbudes bene Baldwines þe hit eadmodlice æt us sohte þat we gestrangedon mid ure gyfe & mid urum gewrite þara halgan stowe freodom & þara kynga gyfa þe ætforan us wæron, Eadmundes kynges, and Cnutes, and Hardecnutes, and Eadwardes þæs eþelan kynges þurh þæs kynrædan & gyfe toeacan godes miltsa wesindon yrfweardes Engla rices þat heonan forð æfre þe forsæda cyrca & se tun þe heo on stent beo freols on eallan þingum fram Arfaste biscop & fram ealra his æftergengla biscopa on wealde on ecnyssa.
And we gefæstnodan eac þas kartan mid uran agenum handgewrite.
And mid ures insigeles onðryste to þam þat þara foresprecenan stowe freodom on ecnysse þuyrhwunie.
Ic Willelm of godes gyfe Engla Kynge bebead þis gewrit to writene & gewritan ic hic gemearcode to trymmunge mid tacne drihtenlican rode.
